在MainActivity中找到了checkflag，定义在so文件中

```java
 static {
      System.loadLibrary("native-lib");
   }

   public native boolean checkFlag(String var1);
```

在MainActivity$1中调用

```java
public void onClick(View var1) {
      MainActivity var2 = this.this$0;
      if (var2.checkFlag(var2.txt.getText().toString())) {
         Toast.makeText(this.this$0, "right!", 0).show();
      } else {
         Toast.makeText(this.this$0, "wrong!", 0).show();
      }
}
```

checkflag的逻辑很简单

```cpp
signed int __fastcall Java_com_example_test002_MainActivity_checkFlag(int a1, int a2, int a3)
{
  const char *v3; // r4
  int v4; // r1
  _DWORD *v5; // r0
  int v6; // r3
  int v7; // r5
  int v8; // r6
  int v9; // r2
  int v10; // r5

  v3 = (const char *)jstringToChar(a1, a3);
  if ( strlen(v3) != 32 )
    return 0;
  v4 = 0;
  v5 = &xx;
  while ( v4 != 32 )
  {
    v6 = 0;
    v7 = 0;
    while ( v7 != 32 )
    {
      v8 = (unsigned __int8)v3[v7];
      v9 = v5[v7++];
      v6 += v9 * v8;
    }
    v10 = x[v4];
    v5 += 32;
    ++v4;
    if ( v6 != v10 )
      return 0;
  }
  return 1;
}
```

整个运算实际上就是一个矩阵乘法，解线性方程组就可以了，但是直接解会得到假flag，在运行过程中x的值发生了变化，调试以下把进行运算的值取出来就可以了

result = [230633,
          241616,
          235681,
          243044,
          215926,
          247340,
          226354,
          208221,
          233269,
          218105,

          235265,
          262900,

          246427,
          226293,
          277096]

A0 = []
for i in range(32):
    a = []
    for j in range(32):
        a.append(s[32 * i + j])
    A0.append(a)

# A = np.mat('1 2 3;2 -1 1;3 0 -1')
A = np.array(A0).astype(int)
b = np.array(result).astype(int)
x = np.linalg.solve(A, b)
x = np.rint(x)
# print(x)
#
# r = [102, 108, 97, 103, 123, 119, 101, 49, 49, 95, 121, 48, 117, 95,
#      102, 48, 117, 110, 100, 95, 49, 55, 95, 99, 48, 110, 103, 114,
#      52, 55, 122, 125]
for i in x:
    print(chr(int(i)), end='')

# we11_y0u_f0und_17_c0ngr47z
